name: Donkey Kong vs Banana Thieves (PS One style)
name_original: Donkey Kong vs Banana Thieves (PS One style)
description:
The game that our small team create for https://itch.io/jam/retro-jam-2021 . Retro DK in Playstation One style! Hope you enjoy!

Help Donkey defend his bananas from King K Rool and his minions!

Bonus!

Modern Graphics Mode!

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - Walk

E - Take barrel

Hold LMB - Gain Power

Release LMB - Throw

A, D - Scroll Hints

P - Pause

Game design
